<template>
  <button class="customInput" @click="$emit('handleClick')" >{{label}}</button>
</template>

<script>

  export default {
  name: 'CustomButton',
  props: {
    label: String
  }
}
</script>
<style scoped>
  .customInput {
    color: #2B1D12;
    background: #9E8370;
    font-size: 15px;
    border-radius: 15px;
    padding: 1em;
    border: none;
    cursor: pointer;
  }

</style>
